DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Period Selector
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Choose a date range based on your Estimate Start Date. The data will include the totals for the Staff Plan Estimates.","WidgetType":"rangeselector","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":50,"WidgetHeader":{"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"startDate":"2019-01-01","endDate":"2019-12-31","type":"year","visible":false},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"SELECT	SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
		v.[Month]
FROM	(
		SELECT 	SUM(v.ActualTime) as [Hours],
				DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
		FROM	Analytics.Timesheet(@CurrentUserId) v
		WHERE	v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate() and
                v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid and
                (@ClientGroupOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' or v.ClientGroupId = @ClientGroupOid)
		GROUP BY DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
		UNION ALL
		SELECT 	SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
				DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
		FROM	Analytics.Leave(@CurrentUserId) v
		WHERE	v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate() and
                v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid
		GROUP BY DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
		UNION ALL
		SELECT 	SUM(v.[Hours]) as [Hours],
				DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1) as [Month]
		FROM	Analytics.Holiday(@CurrentUserId) v
		WHERE	v.[Date] between DateAdd(mm, -12, getdate()) and getdate() and
                v.CompanyId = @CompanyOid
		GROUP BY DATEFROMPARTS(v.[Year], v.[Month], 1)
) v
GROUP BY v.[Month]","mapping":""}},"Filters":{"startDate":"startDate","endDate":"endDate"},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["CompanyOid"]}}]

DashboardDefinitionComponents.Name: Company and Client Group
Deliverables Staffing
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"Hours and Fee per Typology Group","WidgetType":"pivotgrid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"#efefef","WidgetHeight":"","WidgetHeader":{"showContextInfo":false,"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"type":"year","visible":false},"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"showSubTitle":true,"showTitle":true},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
    v.Deliverable,
    v.[Service],
    v.TypologyGroup,
    v.[User],
    v.Division,
    v.Department,
    v.ContractedTime,
    v.ClientGroup,
    v.ClientName,
    v.FeeProposal,
    v.EstimateName,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.Rate, null) as Rate,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.TableRate, null) as TableRate,
    v.TotalDeliverable,
    IIF(n.RoleId is not null, v.Total, null) as Total,
    v.StartDate,
    v.EndDate,
    v.[Order]
FROM
(
    select  IIF(eit.[Order] < 10, concat('0', eit.[Order], '. ', eit.[Description]), concat(eit.[Order], '. ', eit.[Description])) as Deliverable,
            art.[Name] as [Service],
            utg.[Name] as TypologyGroup,
            usr.[Name] as [User],
            div.[Name] as Division,
            dep.[Name] as Department,
            edt.[Hours] as ContractedTime,
            cg.[Name] as ClientGroup,
            cc.[Name] as ClientName,
            c.[Name] as FeeProposal,
            est.[Name] as EstimateName,
            edt.UnitPriceCost as Rate,
            edt.[Rate] as TableRate,
            edt.ValueWithoutVatIncome as TotalDeliverable,
            edt.UnitPriceCost * edt.[Hours] as Total,
            cast(est.[Date] as Date) as StartDate,
            cast(est.[Expiration] as Date) as EndDate,
            eit.[Order]
    from    Estimate est
                left outer join CommercialClient cc on cc.Oid = est.Client
                left outer join [Contract] c on c.Oid = est.[Contract]
                left outer join ClientGroup cg on cg.Oid = cc.ClientGroup,
            EstimateItem eit, 
            Article art,
            EstimateItemDetail edt	
                left outer join Department dep on dep.Oid = edt.Department
                left outer join Division div on div.Oid = dep.Division
                left outer join [User] usr on usr.Oid = edt.[User]
                left outer join UserTypologyGroup utg on utg.Oid = edt.UserTypologyGroup
    where   eit.Estimate = est.Oid and
            edt.EstimateItem = eit.Oid and
            edt.[Type] = 2 and
            art.Oid = eit.Article and 
            est.[Date] between @FromDate and @ToDate and
            (cg.Oid = @ClientGroupOid or @ClientGroupOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000') and
            (utg.Company = @CompanyOid or @CompanyOid = '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000')
) v
    left outer join Analytics.[Authorization](@CurrentUserId) n ON (n.RoleName = 'RateCardRead')
order by v.[Order]
","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"RequiredFilters":["CompanyOid","ClientGroupOid","startDate","endDate"]}}]
